description: This recipe is by Marian Burros and takes 40 minutes. Tell us what you think of it at The New York Times - Dining - Food.
title: Chili With Corn Tortillas
title_page: Chili With Corn Tortillas Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: Pure chili powder contains only the ground pepper, no other spices. To make the dish with beef, sauté one pound of regular ground beef in its fat until browned. Thoroughly drain excess fat and add the meat to the sautéed onions and garlic and proceed with the recipe.
